00040 #include "Pose2D.h"
00041 
00042 Pose2D::Pose2D() : x(0), y(0), theta(0) {
00043 
00044 }
00045 
00046 Pose2D::Pose2D(float x, float y, float theta) : x(x), y(y), theta(theta) {
00047 }
00048 
00049 Pose2D::Pose2D(const Pose2D& orig) : x(orig.getX()), y(orig.getY()), theta(orig.getTheta()) {
00050 }
00051 
00052 Pose2D::~Pose2D() {
00053 }
00054 
00055 const Pose2D& Pose2D::operator=(const Pose2D& orig) {
00056     this->x = orig.getX();
00057     this->y = orig.getY();
00058     this->theta = orig.getTheta();
00059     return *this;
00060 }
00061 
00062 float Pose2D::getX() const {
00063     return this->x;
00064 }
00065 
00066 float Pose2D::getY() const {
00067     return this->y;
00068 }
00069 
00070 float Pose2D::getTheta() const {
00071     return this->theta;
00072 }
00073 
00074 Pose2D operator+(const Pose2D& op1, const Pose2D& op2) {
00075     Pose2D pose(op1.getX() + op2.getX(), op1.getY() + op2.getY(), op1.getTheta() + op2.getTheta());
00076 
00077     return pose;
00078 }
